entry.title: https://github.com/Byaidu/PDFMathTranslate
entry.content: PDF scientific paper translation with preserved formats - 基于 AI 完整保留排版的 PDF 文档全文双语翻译，支持 Google/DeepL/Ollama/OpenAI 等服务，提供 CLI/GUI/Docker/Zotero

entry.content: [CVPR 2024 Oral] InternVL Family: A Pioneering Open-Source Alternative to GPT-4o. 接近GPT-4o表现的开源多模态对话模型

entry.title: https://github.com/OpenSPG/KAG
entry.content: KAG is a logical form-guided reasoning and retrieval framework based on OpenSPG engine and LLMs. It is used to build logical reasoning and factual Q&A solutions for professional domain knowledge bases. It can effectively overcome the shortcomings of the traditional RAG vector similarity calculation model.

entry.title: https://github.com/RVC-Boss/GPT-SoVITS
entry.content: 1 min voice data can also be used to train a good TTS model! (few shot voice cloning)

entry.title: https://github.com/Shubhamsaboo/awesome-llm-apps
entry.content: Collection of awesome LLM apps with AI Agents and RAG using OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini and opensource models.

entry.title: https://github.com/TEN-framework/TEN-Agent
entry.content: TEN Agent is a conversational voice AI agent powered by TEN, integrating Deepseek, Gemini, OpenAI, RTC, and hardware like ESP32. It enables realtime AI capabilities like seeing, hearing, and speaking, and is fully compatible with platforms like Dify and Coze.

entry.title: https://github.com/jingyaogong/minimind
entry.content: 🚀🚀 「大模型」2小时完全从0训练26M的小参数GPT！🌏 Train a 26M-parameter GPT from scratch in just 2h!

entry.title: https://github.com/jumpserver/jumpserver
entry.content: JumpServer is an open-source Privileged Access Management (PAM) tool that provides DevOps and IT teams with on-demand and secure access to SSH, RDP, Kubernetes, Database and RemoteApp endpoints through a web browser.
